author: /cronologia/-/meta/redaccion
title: ¡Histórico! Cristiano Ronaldo anota su gol 900 en el Portugal-Croacia
text: [Cristiano Ronaldo](/cronologia/-/meta/cristiano-ronaldo) El delantero portugués Cristiano Ronaldo alcanzó los 900 goles en su carrera este jueves, al marcar el segundo tanto de Portugal en el partido de la UEFA Nations League ante Croacia. El primer tanto llegó gracias a Diogo Dalot apenas en el minuto 8 de encuentro y posteriormente aumentó a cuenta el jugador del Al Nassr de Arabia Saudita. Cristiano Ronaldo (34’), con un remate con el pie derecho desde el corazón del área tras asistencia de Nuno Mendes, supone un hito más en la carrera de récord del jugador. El delantero suma 900 goles en 1238 partidos oficiales, con una media de casi 0,73 tantos por encuentro, que ha marcado con las camisetas de Sporting (5), del Manchester United (145), del Real Madrid (450), del Juventus (101) y del Al-Nassr (67). A su periplo en estos clubes se suman los 131 tantos que ha firmado con la selección de Portugal. La afición lusa recibió el gol de Cristiano con su ya famoso “Siuuu” y coreó el nombre del delantero de Madeira, que para celebrarlo se tiró al suelo en la línea de fondo con las manos en la cara y una sonrisa.

author: Victoria Martin
title: Salaires: Le SSP revendique une augmentation de 5% - La Liberté
text: Salaires: Le SSP revendique une augmentation de 5% D’après le Syndicat des services publics (SSP), les salaires réels des employés de l’Etat auraient diminué de 3,4% depuis 2020. Il dénonce une indexation insuffisante et revendique leur augmentation de 5% au 1er janvier 2025. Victoria Martin Selon le Syndicat des services publics (SSP), les salaires réels des employés de l’Etat ont diminué de 3,4% dans le canton depuis fin 2020. Il revendique une augmentation de 5% au 1er janvier 2025. Pour rappel, une indexation de 2,74% en 2023 et de 1,42% en 2024 avaient été octroyées. Le pouvoir d’achat des travailleurs en Suisse est sous pression, à cause notamment d’une mesure de l’inflation ne prenant pas en compte l’augmentation réelle des coûts de la vie, d’après le SSP. «Du jamais vu depuis la Seconde Guerre mondiale», peut-on lire dans son communiqué. [L'USS exige jusqu'à 5% d'augmentation des salaires](https://www.laliberte.ch/news-agence/detail/l-uss-exige-jusqu-a-5-d-augmentation-des-salaires/742162?srsltid=AfmBOooHcayKUGbI58jhWUS17ytS5rnVZzO2dezjUb7SVuo4Vie6w77k) Ce dernier pointe également l’augmentation des primes maladie. Il évoque par ailleurs «une redistribution sociale à l’envers» dénonçant entre autres, la baisse d’impôt sur les bénéfices, la défiscalisation des dividendes et leur accroissement (+ 6,3% entre 2022 et 2023 selon le syndicat).

author: Harper Wright
title: Zack Baun secures $51M contract with Eagles as he embraces new chapter and exciting changes in Philadelphia's defensive lineup after thrilling Super Bowl victory
text:
Commitment to a Beloved Culture
Following a thrilling Super Bowl victory, Zack Baun made it clear that his connection with Philadelphia runs deep. Despite expressing curiosity about free agency, he affirmed his desire to remain part of a well-established environment that values teamwork and a winning culture. His remarks underscored a sense of belonging, emphasizing that he viewed himself as just one element in a larger, successful framework.
A Lucrative Agreement for Continued Excellence
Baun agreed to a three-year contract valued at $17 million per season, marking a significant financial commitment by the team. Throughout the season, open and positive communications with the management highlighted a mutual recognition of his on-field contributions. This swift agreement came at a time when key decisions were being made, reinforcing his role as a vital component of the organization.
A Solid Foundation Amid Team Changes
While notable defensive teammates have chosen different paths, the focus remains on the strength of the core. Baun emphasized that the approach taken by the leadership has created a resilient and adaptable foundation, one that continues to thrive even as some players move on. This strategy not only ensures a steady base but also presents a chance to reimagine and enhance the defensive lineup.
Forward-Looking Excitement
Eagerly anticipating the future, Baun expressed excitement about the new chapter for the team. His enthusiasm extends to both the continuing members and those who have departed, reflecting an optimistic outlook on the evolving dynamics of the defense. This fresh perspective signals readiness to embrace change while preserving the values that have driven the team to success.

author: Dee Daniels
title: Unlocking Personal Growth and Transformation: The Power of Understanding Emotions Internally - Business News Today - EIN Presswire
text:
Unlocking Personal Growth and Transformation: The Power of Understanding Emotions Internally
PHOENIX, ARIZONA, UNITED STATES, April 4, 2024 / EINPresswire.com / -- Unlocking Personal Growth and Transformation: The Power of Understanding Emotions Internally
In the realm of personal growth and development, a profound wellspring of power awaits within each individualâ€”a deeply rooted ability to comprehend and process emotions internally. While external forces may shape experiences, internal dialogue and emotional intelligence propel individuals toward self-discovery and fulfillment. Delving into the significance of understanding one's emotions reveals the transformative impact it can have on personal growth.
Central to self-awareness is the capacity to recognize, acknowledge, and understand emotions. Rather than permitting emotions to dictate actions, individuals possess the capability to observe and interpret feelings with clarity and insight. This process of internal reflection offers valuable insights into thoughts, beliefs, and motivations, setting the stage for profound personal transformation.
Embracing emotions as messengers of deeper truths opens individuals to a wealth of self-discovery and growth opportunities. Each emotion serves as a valuable indicator of inner state, providing invaluable clues about needs, desires, and areas for potential growth. Whether it be feelings of joy, sadness, fear, or anger, each emotion carries its own unique wisdom, ready to be explored and understood.
Furthermore, processing emotions internally cultivates greater resilience and emotional intelligence. Rather than reacting impulsively to external stimuli, individuals develop the capacity to respond thoughtfully and consciously to life's challenges. Through mindful observation and reflection, they learn to navigate the ebb and flow of emotions with grace and composure, harnessing their energy as a catalyst for growth.
Moreover, understanding and processing emotions internally foster a deeper sense of self-compassion and acceptance. Instead of harsh self-judgment for experiencing certain emotions, individuals learn to embrace them with kindness and understanding, recognizing them as natural aspects of the human experience. In doing so, they cultivate a greater sense of self-love and acceptance, laying the foundation for authentic personal growth and development.
In essence, the power of understanding emotions and processing them internally lies in its ability to unlock true potential and facilitate profound personal transformation. By cultivating self-awareness, resilience, and compassion, individuals empower themselves to navigate life's challenges with grace and authenticity. Through this inward journey of exploration and self-discovery, they uncover the limitless possibilities that lie within, embarking on a path of growth, fulfillment, and self-actualization.
Dee Daniels

author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Sophomore Julianne Cimarusti's Inspiring Journey in Wrestling - BVM Sports
text:
Sophomore Julianne Cimarusti’s Inspiring Journey in Wrestling
Sophomore Julianne "Julie" Cimarusti has made a significant mark in high school wrestling, setting school records during the 2024-2025 season. Competing in the California Interscholastic Federation (CIF), she earned second place at the CIF Individual Championships and placed 12th in California at the CIF State Championship. Drawing motivation from her family's wrestling background, Cimarusti transformed her fitness and mindset, overcoming self-doubt and pressure during competitions. She emphasizes confidence for female wrestlers, encouraging them to embrace their passion. With two years left in high school, Cimarusti aims to rank even higher in the state and ultimately wrestle at Iowa, inspired by her idol Spencer Lee.
By the Numbers- Cimarusti earned second place at the CIF Individual Championships.
- She is currently ranked 12th in California in the 140-pound weight class.
- Cimarusti has a three-match winning streak at the CIF State Championship.
- The CIF competition included wrestlers from over 1,600 schools.
Cimarusti plans to aggressively train in the offseason to improve her performance and achieve her goal of ranking in the top five in the state. She aims to continue building her skills and confidence as she advances through high school wrestling competitions.
Bottom LineCimarusti's journey underscores the importance of perseverance and self-belief in a male-dominated sport. Her story serves as an inspiration for aspiring female wrestlers to pursue their passion and confidence in the face of challenges.

author: Times Of India
title: Thrikkakara municipality's app fails to address food safety concerns | Kochi News - The Times of India
text:
Kochi: Nearly five months since the launch of Thrikkakara Consumer Protection Forum app, aimed at helping consumers report food quality issues in eateries under the local body, the initiative failed to deliver results.
Designed by a Thrissur-based IT firm, the app was launched by minister for food and civil supplies GR Anil in Sept last year, promising to ensure access to quality food products within the municipality's jurisdiction. The initiative was introduced following a rise in stale food sales and the death of a 24-year-old man due to food poisoning in Oct last year.
Municipality initially assured that the app's administration panel would include officials from municipality, food safety department, legal metrology department and a representative from police department.
Despite its promising launch, municipality officials revealed that the app remains non-functional, with no complaints received to date. Municipality chairperson Radhamani Pillai admitted its failure, stating, "The app has not yielded the intended results; we will analyze what went wrong in its operation." Municipality health standing committee chairperson Varghese Plassery confirmed that health wing did not receive any complaints through the app.

author: Jack Aylmer
title: NASA, SpaceX launch mission to the moon with goal of finding lunar water
text:
A NEW MISSION TO THE MOON IS NOW UNDERWAY-
WITH A GOAL OF FINDING LUNAR WATER.
LAST NIGHT, A SPACEX FALCON 9 ROCKET SUCCESSFULLY LAUNCHED FROM NASA’S KENNEDY SPACE CENTER-
CARRYING THE ATHENA LUNAR LANDER AND NASA’S LUNAR TRAILBLAZER ORBITER.
ATHENA IS PART OF NASA’S COMMERCIAL LUNAR PAYLOAD SERVICES PROGRAM- WHICH COLLABORATES WITH PRIVATE COMPANIES TO DELIVER SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY PAYLOADS TO THE LUNAR SURFACE.
THE LANDER IS EXPECTED TO REACH LUNAR ORBIT IN FOUR TO FIVE DAYS AND ATTEMPT A LANDING ONE TO THREE DAYS LATER-
IF SUCCESSFUL, IT WILL OPERATE NEAR THE MOON’S SOUTH POLE FOR APPROXIMATELY TEN EARTH DAYS.
ONCE IT TOUCHES DOWN, ATHENA WILL USE NASA SCIENCE INSTRUMENTS TO SEARCH FOR WATER ICE BENEATH THE LUNAR SURFACE.
THE OBJECTIVE IS TO DETERMINE WHETHER THERE’S ENOUGH WATER HERE TO POTENTIALLY UTILIZE FOR SUSTAINABLE HUMAN HABITATION IN SPACE.
TWO SECONDARY VEHICLES WILL ALSO BE DEPLOYED TO EXPLORE THE SURROUNDING TERRAIN.
MEANWHILE, NASA’S LUNAR TRAILBLAZER WILL OPERATE IN LUNAR ORBIT, MAPPING WATER ICE DEPOSITS ON THE MOON.
NASA ORIGINALLY ALLOCATED 47 MILLION DOLLARS FOR FUNDING THESE EFFORTS-
BUT LATER INCREASED THAT TOTAL TO 62.5 MILLION DOLLARS DUE TO ADDITIONAL DATA ACQUISITION REQUESTS.
AS THE MISSION PROGRESSES, SCIENTISTS AND ENGINEERS WILL ANALYZE FINDINGS FROM ATHENA AND LUNAR TRAILBLAZER TO INFORM FUTURE LUNAR EXPLORATION EFFORTS-
INCLUDING HUMANITY’S EVENTUAL RETURN TO THE MOON.
FOR STRAIGHT ARROW NEWS, I’M JACK AYLMER.
